{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = Wireless-N Multifunction VPN Firewall |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/products/routers/rv180w-wireless-n-multifunction-vpn-router/index.html |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Cisco |model = RV180 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = W |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = P27-RV180W |icid = 5604A-RV180W |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Cavium;CNS3410; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = 11MPCore |cpu1spd = 300 <!-- 300 / 500 / 700 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;; |flash1size = 32 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Nanya;; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Broadcom;BCM53125; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:C0:02 |oui = 00:C0:02
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = Mini PCIe |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = SerComm |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 12/29/2011 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 882658420436 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B007RB1LQM |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = <!-- Radio module name, optional link, Leave blank for none --> |rad1modif = Mini PCIe (half) |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;; |rad1chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |rad1chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== This device uses a [http://www.cavium.com/processor_ECONA-ARM.html ''Cavium'' ECONA ARM SoC]. :"YYP00D-1.6" is silkscreened on the main board. :"CK7794V-0" and "YYP00N0B-1.0" is silkscreened on the wireless module in the FCC photos.
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/security/security-reviews/31746-cisco-rv180-vpn-router-reviewed Cisco RV180 review on '''SNB'''] :This device's board seems to be near-identical to the [[Cisco RV180]] (non-wireless model). :The Switch in this model is assumed to be the same. :"YYP00C-1.6" is silkscreened on the RV180 board. :Single ''ESMT'' M14D5121632A-2.5B (64MB) RAM chip :used despite a place on the board for another.
==See also== *[http://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/products/routers/small-business-rv-series-routers/models-comparison.html Cisco models comparison] *[[Cisco RV120W]] Wireless-N VPN Firewall *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/31393-cisco-rv-120w-wireless-n-vpn-firewall-reviewed Review on '''SNB'''] • [http://www.cisco.com/en/US/products/ps10852/index.html PPage] • FCC ID: P27-RV120W :CPU: [[Cavium]] [http://www.caviumnetworks.com/OCTEON-Plus_CN50XX.html CN5010] @300MHz :Broadcom BCM5325 FE switch :64 MB of RAM and 16 MB of flash :Broadcom BCM4322 802.11bgn :2.4GHz radio ([http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/31360-new-to-the-charts-cisco-rv-120w-wireless-n-vpn-firewall mini-PCI module])
*[[Cisco RV220W]] Wireless Network Security Firewall *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/31456-cisco-rv220w-wireless-network-security-firewall-reviewed Review on '''SNB'''] • [http://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/products/routers/rv220w-wireless-network-security-firewall/index.html PPage] • FCC ID: P27RV220W :CPU: [[Cavium]] [http://www.caviumnetworks.com/OCTEON-Plus_CN50XX.html CN5010] @400MHz :Broadcom BCM53115 GbE switch :128MB of RAM and 32MB of flash :Broadcom BCM4322 802.11abgn :2.4/5GHz radio (mini-PCI module)
[[Category:English Documentation]]
